thread.title: One dead after stabbing at a Jack in the Box in Hollywood
thread.title_full: One dead after stabbing at a Jack in the Box in Hollywood | Daily Mail Online

author: Kaileen Gaul For Dailymail.com
title: One dead after stabbing at a Jack in the Box in Hollywood
text:
A suspect was shot dead by police following a stabbing spree in broad daylight at a Jack in the Box.
At 1.58pm emergency services were called to the fast food joint on Sunset Boulevard near the CNN building in Hollywood.
There are reports that a man wielding a knife was in the area threatening to stab people on the busy street.
Four people suffered stab and gunshot wounds. The suspect is dead and two victims are critically injured and one is in stable condition according to Los Angeles police.
Los Angeles Police officers stand on guard, after a stabbing and police involved shooting at a Jack in the Box
Firefighters talk outside a Jack in the Box where a man suspected of stabbing three people was killed
Police investigators interview witnesses after the Jack in the Box stabbing
The suspected attacker was killed died before first responders arrived according to KTLA .
Graphic video from inside the restaurant shows police hovering holding down a man in a purple shirt near several pools of blood and scattered french fries.
A victim appears to be getting their arm tied up to stop blood flow.
Four people were injured in a stabbing at a Jack in the Box and one person died
In the video a man appears to be restrained by LAPD officers inside of a Jack in the Box
Blood is seen splattered on the sidewalk at the restaurant which is near the CNN building
Blood was seen on the sidewalk and multiple ambulances were rushed to the scene. The deceased victim was seen being wheeled out of the building on a gurney.
Witnesses nearby told told the station they saw officers enter the restaurant: 'Two of them just jet into the side door of the Jack in the Box, guns drawn, and we hear 'pop, pop, pop.'
'We don't know what happened inside the Jack in the Box at all.'
Blood is seen covering the street by North Cahuenga and Wilcox near where someone stabbed people inside a Jack in the Box
Emergency vehicles line the street where there was a stabbing and an officer involved shooting inside the Jack in the Box
Emergency services appear to help someone who is in a wheelchair outside of the restaurant
CNN reporter Maeve Reston said there were reports of a man running down Sunset Boulevard trying to stab people.
She tweeted: 'Unclear how many stabbing victims there are, but suspect ran down Sunset Blvd. trying to stab people outside our CNN office in Hollywood.'
She reported the knife wielding person tried to enter a coffee shop too but was blocked by a customer holding the glass door.
Aerial footage shows police have taped off the building.
